tasks.build-all: deno task build-linux; deno task build-windows; deno task build-darwin-intel; deno task build-darwin; gzip dist/*/*
tasks.build-linux: TARGET=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && mkdir -p dist/$TARGET && deno compile --target $TARGET -o dist/$TARGET/notify-discord --allow-env --allow-write --allow-read --allow-net mod.ts
tasks.build-windows: TARGET=x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && mkdir -p dist/$TARGET && deno compile --target $TARGET -o dist/$TARGET/notify-discord.exe --allow-env --allow-write --allow-read --allow-net mod.ts
tasks.build-darwin-intel: TARGET=x86_64-apple-darwin && mkdir -p dist/$TARGET && deno compile --target $TARGET -o dist/$TARGET/notify-discord --allow-env --allow-write --allow-read --allow-net mod.ts
tasks.build-darwin: TARGET=aarch64-apple-darwin && mkdir -p dist/$TARGET && deno compile --target $TARGET -o dist/$TARGET/notify-discord --allow-env --allow-write --allow-read --allow-net mod.ts
